explains: adj. 败血症的；[医] 脓毒性的；腐败的
wordGroup: septic shock 感染性休克；败血性休克；脓毒性休克

sentences.en: A dirty cut may go septic.
sentences.cn: 伤口不干净容易受感染。

sentences.en: A flake of plaster from the ceiling fell into his eye, which became septic.
sentences.cn: 天花板上的一片灰掉进他眼睛里,引起了感染。

sentences.en: In this case, because it is caused by bacterial toxins, it is called septic shock.
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下，因为它是造成细菌毒素，这是所谓的感染性休克。
